<script setup lang="ts">
import { DrawerRoot } from 'vaul-vue'

interface Props {
  open?: boolean
  defaultOpen?: boolean
  modal?: boolean
  direction?: 'top' | 'bottom' | 'left' | 'right'
  activeSnapPoint?: number | string | null
  snapPoints?: (number | string)[]
  fadeFromIndex?: number
  shouldScaleBackground?: boolean
  closeThreshold?: number
  dismissible?: boolean
  handleOnly?: boolean
  nested?: boolean
  fixed?: boolean
  noBodyStyles?: boolean
}

const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
  shouldScaleBackground: true,
})

const emit = defineEmits<{
  'update:open': [value: boolean]
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <DrawerRoot
    v-bind="props"
    :should-scale-background="props.shouldScaleBackground"
    @update:open="emit('update:open', $event)"
  >
    <slot />
  </DrawerRoot>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DrawerTrigger as DrawerTriggerPrimitive } from 'vaul-vue'
</script>

<template>
  <DrawerTriggerPrimitive as-child>
    <slot />
  </DrawerTriggerPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DrawerPortal, DrawerOverlay, DrawerContent as DrawerContentPrimitive } from 'vaul-vue'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <DrawerPortal>
    <DrawerOverlay class="fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/70" />
    <DrawerContentPrimitive
      :class="
        cn(
          'fixed inset-x-0 bottom-0 z-50 mt-24 flex h-auto flex-col border-3 border-b-0 border-foreground bg-background shadow-[0px_-8px_0px_hsl(var(--shadow-color))]',
          $props.class
        )
      "
    >
      <div class="mx-auto mt-4 h-2 w-[100px] bg-foreground" />
      <slot />
    </DrawerContentPrimitive>
  </DrawerPortal>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DrawerTitle as DrawerTitlePrimitive } from 'vaul-vue'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <DrawerTitlePrimitive
    :class="cn('text-lg font-bold uppercase tracking-wide leading-none', $props.class)"
  >
    <slot />
  </DrawerTitlePrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DrawerDescription as DrawerDescriptionPrimitive } from 'vaul-vue'

defineProps<{

}>()

<template>
  <DrawerDescriptionPrimitive :class="cn('text-sm text-muted-foreground', $props.class)">
    <slot />
  </DrawerDescriptionPrimitive>
</template>
